29#ifndef HB_FACE_HH
30#define HB_FACE_HH
31
32#include "hb.hh"
33
34#include "hb-shaper.hh"
35#include "hb-shape-plan.hh"
36#include "hb-ot-face.hh"
37
38
39/*
40 * hb_face_t
41 */
42
43#define HB_SHAPER_IMPLEMENT(shaper) HB_SHAPER_DATA_INSTANTIATE_SHAPERS(shaper, face);
44#include "hb-shaper-list.hh"
45#undef HB_SHAPER_IMPLEMENT
46
47struct hb_face_t
48{
49 hb_object_header_t header;
50
51 hb_reference_table_func_t reference_table_func;
52 void *user_data;
53 hb_destroy_func_t destroy;
54
55 unsigned int index; /* Face index in a collection, zero-based. */
56 mutable hb_atomic_int_t upem; /* Units-per-EM. */
57 mutable hb_atomic_int_t num_glyphs; /* Number of glyphs. */
58
59 hb_shaper_object_dataset_t<hb_face_t> data;/* Various shaper data. */
60 hb_ot_face_t table; /* All the face's tables. */
61
62 /* Cache */
63 struct plan_node_t
64 {
65 hb_shape_plan_t *shape_plan;
66 plan_node_t *next;
67 };
68#ifndef HB_NO_SHAPER
69 hb_atomic_ptr_t<plan_node_t> shape_plans;
70#endif
71
72 hb_blob_t *reference_table (hb_tag_t tag) const
73 {
74 hb_blob_t *blob;
75
76 if (unlikely (!reference_table_func))
77 return hb_blob_get_empty ();
78
79 blob = reference_table_func (/*XXX*/const_cast<hb_face_t *> (this), tag, user_data);
80 if (unlikely (!blob))
81 return hb_blob_get_empty ();
82
83 return blob;
84 }
85
86 unsigned int get_upem () const
87 {
88 unsigned int ret = upem;
89 if (unlikely (!ret))
90 {
91 return load_upem ();
92 }
93 return ret;
94 }
95
96 unsigned int get_num_glyphs () const
97 {
98 unsigned int ret = num_glyphs;
99 if (unlikely (ret == UINT_MAX))
100 return load_num_glyphs ();
101 return ret;
102 }
103
104 private:
105 HB_INTERNAL unsigned int load_upem () const;
106 HB_INTERNAL unsigned int load_num_glyphs () const;
107};
108DECLARE_NULL_INSTANCE (hb_face_t);
109
110
111#endif /* HB_FACE_HH */
112
